about_the_game:
IsoChess is a simple chess game for new and experienced players alike.

Practice against a computer!

IsoChess allows you to play against an assortment of community developed chess engines. Stockfish, a popular open source chess AI, has been included out of the box. Stockfish is both a very strong player, as well as capable at playing at lower difficulties. Want more? Most existing chess engines are compatible (via the Universal Chess Interface). Simply find a compatible engine, and place it under the ai/ directory of the game. When creating an AI game, you can select from any of your installed engines. Great for practicing and developing your chess skills.

Play against anyone!

The free / demo version of IsoChess allows joining of multiplayer games. With a paid copy of the game, you can create games to play against other owners of the game, or anyone else on Steam! And it supports cross-play, so whether your friends use Windows, Mac, or Linux, you can send them a challenge (و •̀ ᴗ•́ )و

Online and Offline Multiplayer

Offline play supports human vs human games, human vs AI, or even AI vs AI games. Take chess with you, even when you can't get online.

Two Art Styles

Play either in retro isometric "2.5D", or classic top-down 2d modes. Switch between graphic styles at any time during a game.

Demo Features

  • Local multiplayer. (2 players on the same computer)
  • Join online games. (Games created by Paid copies)

Paid game features (Everything from the demo plus)

  • Pay once, access forever.
  • Practice against the AI.
  • Create multiplayer games.
  • Play against anyone on Steam.
  • Record all your games.
  • Review your past games.

legal_notice:
This game makes use of the following open source technologies, which are available under the following licenses. For more information, see LICENSES.md in the install directory.

Stockfish Chess : https://github.com/official-stockfish/Stockfish
Stockfish is available under the GPL V3 License.
https://github.com/official-stockfish/Stockfish/blob/master/Copying.txt

No source code from Stockfish is used in the core game, however a Stockfish binary has been bundled at ai/stockfish. No modifications have been made to the source code.

SDL 2.0:
This game is built with SDL 2.0, which is available under the zlib license. The complete license can be found at on the libsdl website.
